    {arr.map((flight) => (
  • {flight.company + " "+flight.number}
    • ))}
*/} console.log(company) const rand = (min, max) => Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min)) + min; return (
  →  



{dep_date}      {arr_date}
{arr.map((flight) => (
{names[flight.number%4]}

enter
)) }
) } export default DispFlights
